description: A Chinese guardian lion, also known as a stone lion or foo dog, is a traditional Chinese architectural ornament that symbolizes protection and good fortune.
A Chinese incense burner, also known as a censer, is a decorative container used to hold burning incense. It is often made of metal or ceramic and features intricate designs and carvings.
A marble-lightstone statue of a woman, inspired by ancient Greco-Roman art, she holds a basket symbolizing harvest and abundance

A Gansu horse sculpture, also known as a Gansu horse figurine, is a traditional Chinese art piece that depicts a horse in a stylized and abstract form. It is often made of clay or ceramic and features intricate designs and patterns.
The Wallace Fountain is a green cast-iron drinking fountain portraying a symbol of peace and charm.
